name: Paramount Hero
description:
Overview

Inspired by multiplayer classics, Paramount Hero is a third-person skill-progression MMO with a fantasy world setting. Kill mobs, collect loot, hone your skills, complete quests, and cooperate with (or kill!) other players to become a legendary hero.

Features

  • 50+ varieties of monsters including unique rare-spawns
  • 20+ quests - and not of the "kill X monsters" variety
  • Dozens of skills and spells
  • Hundreds of items to collect and craft
  • Day/night cycles
  • Dynamically changing weather
  • Summonable pets who will fight for you
  • Interactive and branching quest NPC dialog
  • 3km² main world area, procedurally generated content with hand-crafted points of interest
  • Real-time multi-shard online multiplayer
  • Support for hundreds of players per shard
  • In-game proximity/global chat
  • Situation-based NPC AI
  • Fully server-authoritative / cheat-resistant
